ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] fear kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Look for the empty lakes (that s what I call em anyway) the rocky dips in the ground with nothing around them.  Most of them are roamer free (or at least a
ygData.messageBody:
Look for the empty lakes (that's what I call em anyway) the rocky dips in
the ground with nothing around them. Most of them are roamer free (or at
least a VERY large chunk of them, enough to be safe in) and you can safely
charm kite or fear/snare in them.

Luck!

Lyrn
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 10:54 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] fear kiting


> Been searching for a Roamer free area in FM, the ledge by Lake is being
used
> nearly 100% of the time I've tried on E'ci and they aren't too keen on my
> fearing their mobs ;-p
> Know any other roamer free areas in FM?
>
> Kitasi Faegehearper
>
> (and it works *BEAUTIFULLY* at 34 in Frontier Mountains, just gotta pull
to
> the ledge near the Ill Omen zone or some other "roamer-free" spot)
>
> -=B=-
> 34th
> The Rathe
